pages.text: The Athame is an essential tool to any witch. It can be used to gather special drops (such as heads) from mobs, and also has a lot of niche uses.$(br2)Being made out of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)Silver$(), it is perfectly usable against $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$() and $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolves$() too.

By slaying a humanoid with an Athame while holding a Glass Bottle in the offhand, one can collect Bottles of Blood.$(br2)Athames are also used to start most sacrificial $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Rituals$().
